channel.title: cryptography on kel.bz
channel.description: Recent content in cryptography on kel.bz

item.title: the hidden number problem
item.description: Notes on the Boneh and Venkatesan's paper describing the Hidden Number Problem and code demonstrating some of the results.

item.title: measures of entropy
item.description: Different ways to describe the entropy of a random variable.

item.title: rsa-based key encapsulation mechanisms
item.description: How to use RSA to encrypt symmetric keys and how RSA-KEM relates to RSA-OAEP.

item.title: building lattice reduction (LLL) intuition
item.description: My attempt to grok the Lenstra–Lenstra–Lovász (LLL) algorithm used for basis reduction.

item.title: a note on subgroup confinement attacks
item.description: Subgroup confinement attacks can apply in offline and online contexts.

item.title: the ggh cryptosystem
item.description: An introduction to lattice-based cryptography using the broken Goldreich–Goldwasser–Halevi (GGH) cryptosystem.

item.title: asis ctf: rsa write-up
item.description: Breaking RSA with sequential prime key parameter generation.

item.title: tokyo westerns / mma ctf: twin primes write-up
item.description: Decrypting RSA ciphertexts using correlated parameters.

item.title: secure password hash migrations
item.description: How to securely migrate from an insecure password hash algorithm to a secure one.
